Ok, so, I never planned on making an account, but i'm sick of people(nerd42) for instance, saying ridiculously arrogant things about movies based on games.  Saying that it makes religious people look bad and blah blah blah suck it up ok? It's based off of a VIDEO GAME, hollywood didn't make it like this, it was like this in the 90's so obviously its going to be like this in the movie. Quit thinking you're making a point by pointing out the faults in a god damn movie adaptation of a video game.  If you really want to say things about religion, piratebay is not the place for you, please leave -_-
this is a place to comment on the quality of the torrent, not to discuss theologic principals. if you didnt like the damn movie, why the fuck are you even here for the soundtrack?
